hero.headline: Precision Manufacturing Excellence
hero.subheadline: Mayur Brass: Your Trusted Partner for Reliable Brass Components

about.title: About Mayur Brass
about.description: Mayur Brass is a leading manufacturer of precision brass components serving diverse industries. With over 20 years of experience, we have established a reputation for delivering high-quality products with tight tolerance control. Our state-of-the-art facility equipped with the latest machinery enables us to meet the stringent requirements of our clients in the automotive, pneumatic, and aerospace sectors.

items.title: Advanced Machinery
items.description: Equipped with the latest CNC and VMC machines to ensure precision and efficiency.

items.title: Tight Tolerance Control
items.description: Strict quality control measures to deliver components with a tolerance of ±0.0005 mm.

items.title: Global Footprint
items.description: Serving clients worldwide with a network of 4 manufacturing plants across India.

items.title: B2B Solutions
items.description: Catering to the needs of dealers, manufacturers, and OEMs in various industries.

products.title: Our Product Portfolio
products.subtitle: Precision-engineered brass components for various applications

items.title: Custom Manufacturing
features: Tight tolerance levels up to ±0.0005 mm
Advanced CNC and VMC machinery for precision manufacturing
Experienced team of engineers and technicians
Flexible production runs to meet your needs
Comprehensive quality control measures
items.description: Our custom manufacturing service offers precision-engineered brass components tailored to your exact specifications. With state-of-the-art machinery and a team of skilled technicians, we guarantee tight tolerance levels and exceptional quality for your unique requirements across various industries.

items.title: Rapid Prototyping
features: Fast turnaround times for prototypes
State-of-the-art 3D printing and CNC machining
Skilled technicians to ensure precision and quality
Cost-effective prototyping solutions
Seamless integration with your product development process
items.description: Our rapid prototyping service empowers you to quickly bring your ideas to life. Leveraging the latest 3D printing and CNC machining technologies, we can produce high-quality prototypes with unparalleled turnaround times, enabling you to test, iterate, and refine your designs before full-scale production.

items.title: Aerospace Parts Manufacturing
features: Strict adherence to aerospace industry standards
Tight tolerance levels for critical aerospace components
Comprehensive traceability and documentation
Experienced team with specialized aerospace knowledge
Rapid turnaround times for prototype and production parts
items.description: Leveraging our expertise in precision manufacturing, we offer specialized aerospace parts production. Our advanced machinery and quality control processes ensure the highest standards of accuracy and reliability, making us a trusted partner for aerospace companies seeking reliable and high-performance brass components.

items.title: Industry Experience
items.description: Years of experience in delivering high-quality solutions to our clients.

items.title: Customer Focus
items.description: We prioritize our customers' needs and work closely with them to achieve their goals.

items.title: Advanced Technology
items.description: We use cutting-edge technology and modern equipment to ensure superior results.

items.title: Reliable Partnership
items.description: We build long-term relationships with our clients based on trust and reliability.

items.text: Mayur Brass has been a reliable and quality-focused partner for our manufacturing operations. Their attention to detail and commitment to on-time delivery has been crucial in maintaining our production schedules. We highly recommend them to any industrial business looking for a trustworthy brass component supplier.
items.author: Rajesh Kumar

items.text: As a company focused on providing high-quality industrial solutions, we have been extremely satisfied with the products and services from Mayur Brass. Their attention to quality control and their responsiveness to our needs have been key factors in our successful partnership over the years.
items.author: Klaus Mueller

items.text: Mayur Brass has been a valuable supplier for our company. Their brass components consistently meet our high standards for quality and reliability. The team is knowledgeable, responsive, and committed to ensuring our satisfaction. We appreciate their dedication to customer service and look forward to continuing our successful partnership.
items.author: Sanjay Mehta

steps.title: Design and Engineering
steps.description: Our team of experienced designers and engineers work closely with clients to understand their precise requirements. We leverage our expertise in metallurgy and manufacturing techniques to develop custom brass products that meet the highest quality standards.

steps.title: Precision Manufacturing
steps.description: Using state-of-the-art equipment and strict quality control measures, we manufacture each brass component with meticulous attention to detail. Our skilled technicians ensure that every piece is crafted to perfection, adhering to the specifications outlined during the design phase.

steps.title: Rigorous Testing
steps.description: Before delivering the finished products, we put them through a comprehensive testing process to verify their functionality, durability, and adherence to industry standards. This step ensures that our clients receive brass components that are reliable, safe, and fit for their intended purpose.

steps.title: Timely Delivery
steps.description: Recognizing the importance of meeting deadlines, we have streamlined our logistics and supply chain management to ensure prompt and reliable delivery of our brass products. Our clients can count on us to fulfill their orders within the agreed-upon timeframe, minimizing any disruptions to their operations.

items.answer: Mayur Brass is a leading manufacturer of a wide range of brass products, including brass fittings, valves, taps, and other brass hardware. We specialize in customized brass products based on customer specifications and requirements.
items.question: What types of brass products do you manufacture?

items.answer: You can place an order for our brass products by contacting our sales team either via email, phone, or by filling out the online contact form on our website. Our team will guide you through the ordering process, discuss your specific requirements, and provide you with a quote. Once the order is confirmed, we will proceed with the manufacturing and delivery of your order.
items.question: How do I place an order for your brass products?

items.answer: The pricing for our brass products depends on various factors, such as the quantity, size, complexity of the design, and the materials used. We strive to offer competitive and transparent pricing to our customers. Our sales team will provide you with a detailed quote based on your specific requirements. We also offer volume discounts for larger orders.
items.question: What is your pricing structure for brass products?

items.answer: The lead time for delivery of our brass products can vary depending on the complexity of the order, available inventory, and the current production schedule. Typically, the lead time ranges from 2 to 4 weeks for standard brass products. For custom or specialized orders, the lead time may be slightly longer. Our sales team will provide you with an accurate delivery timeline once your order is placed.
items.question: What is the lead time for delivery of brass products?

items.answer: Yes, we offer a quality guarantee on all our brass products. Our manufacturing process adheres to strict quality standards, and each product undergoes rigorous testing before being shipped. We also provide a warranty period of 12 months on our brass products, covering any manufacturing defects. If you encounter any issues with our products during the warranty period, please contact our customer support team, and we will address the problem promptly.
items.question: Do you offer any quality guarantees or warranties on your brass products?

items.answer: Absolutely! Mayur Brass specializes in providing customized brass products to meet the unique requirements of our clients. Our experienced engineering team can work closely with you to design and manufacture brass products that meet your specific needs. Whether it's a custom shape, size, or finish, we have the capabilities to bring your vision to life. Please feel free to discuss your custom requirements with our sales team, and we'll be happy to provide a tailored solution.
items.question: Can you accommodate custom brass product designs or specifications?

items.answer: Mayur Brass serves a diverse range of industries, including plumbing, construction, automotive, and industrial manufacturing. Our brass products are widely used in applications such as water supply systems, HVAC systems, machinery components, and various industrial equipment. We have a proven track record of delivering high-quality brass solutions to our clients across multiple sectors.
items.question: What industries do you typically serve with your brass products?

items.answer: Yes, we pride ourselves on our excellent customer support and technical assistance. Our dedicated customer service team is available to answer any questions or address any concerns you may have regarding our brass products, even after the sale. If you encounter any issues or require technical guidance, please don't hesitate to reach out to us, and we'll be happy to provide the necessary support to ensure your satisfaction with our products and services.
items.question: Do you offer any post-sale support or technical assistance for your brass products?

data.title: Awards & Recognition
data.subtitle: Recognition of our excellence and achievements

items.title: Brass Smelting Plant
features: Capacity: 500 metric tons per month
Furnace Type: Induction Furnaces
Casting Process: Continuous Casting
Quality Certifications: ISO 9001, ASME, BIS
items.description: Our state-of-the-art brass smelting plant is equipped with advanced furnaces and casting equipment to produce high-quality brass ingots and billets. The facility operates under strict quality control measures to ensure consistent metallurgical properties.

items.title: Brass Rolling Mill
features: Capacity: 300 metric tons per month
Rolling Stands: 4-high reversing mill
Thickness Range: 0.5 mm to 10 mm
Finished Product Forms: Sheets, Strips, Foils
items.description: The brass rolling mill is a key component of our manufacturing process, converting brass ingots into sheets, strips, and foils of various thicknesses. The mill is equipped with state-of-the-art rolling stands and precision thickness control systems to ensure dimensional accuracy.

items.title: Brass Extrusion Plant
features: Capacity: 200 metric tons per month
Extrusion Press Type: Horizontal Hydraulic
Product Range: Bars, Rods, Tubes, Profiles
Extrusion Diameter: 20 mm to 150 mm
items.description: Our brass extrusion plant is capable of producing a wide range of brass profiles, bars, and tubes to support diverse customer applications. The plant is equipped with advanced hydraulic extrusion presses and die-changing systems for efficient production.

items.title: In-house Tool and Die Workshop
features: Capability: Design and manufacture of custom dies, molds, and tools
CNC Machining Centers: 5-axis and 3-axis
Tool Grinding Machines: Precision surface and cylindrical grinders
Tooling Materials: High-speed steel, carbide, and special alloys
items.description: To ensure the precision and quality of our products, we maintain an in-house tool and die workshop. This facility is equipped with CNC machining centers, tool grinding machines, and skilled technicians to design, fabricate, and maintain the specialized tooling required for our manufacturing processes.

items.title: Wastewater Treatment Plant
features: Treatment Capacity: 100 cubic meters per day
Treatment Process: Physico-chemical and biological treatment
Discharge Standards: Compliant with local environmental regulations
Water Recycling Rate: 80% of treated water
items.description: Mayur Brass is committed to sustainable manufacturing practices. Our on-site wastewater treatment plant ensures the responsible management of industrial effluents, enabling us to recycle and reuse water in our production processes.
